title: CMake support
body: I really love the idea behind C++/WinRT, but what my experience is as a cross-platform dev is that it's strange how the language projection seems to cater to portable code, the build system is baked to be MSBuild, alien to most non-MS devs. I used to be a prime time VS dev (still my primary IDE), but I've been using CMake for 10+ years and feel way more home in it, than MSBuild environments.
